model.name: flightdata
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW FlightData ( Id string PRIMARY KEY, Airline string, FlightNo string, SSN string, DepartLoc string, ArriveLoc string, TravelDate string ) AS SELECT SP.Id, SP.Airline, SP.FlightNo, SP.SSN, SP.DepartLoc, SP.ArriveLoc, SP.TravelDate FROM (EXEC flight-file.getTextFiles('flight-data.txt')) AS f, TEXTTABLE(f.flight-file COLUMNS Id string, Airline string, FlightNo string, SSN string, DepartLoc string, ArriveLoc string, TravelDate string HEADER) AS SP;

model.name: persondata
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW PersonData ( SSN string PRIMARY KEY, Name string, Nationality string, DOB string ) AS SELECT SP.SSN, SP.Name, SP.Nationality, SP.DOB FROM (EXEC person-file.getTextFiles('person-data.txt')) AS f, TEXTTABLE(f.person-file COLUMNS SSN string, Name string, Nationality string, DOB string HEADER) AS SP;

model.name: allpersondata
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW PERSON ( SSN string, Name string, Nationality string, DOB string, Id string PRIMARY KEY, Airline string, FlightNo string, DepartLoc string, ArriveLoc string, TravelDate string ) AS SELECT P.SSN, P.Name, P.Nationality, P.DOB, T.Id, T.Airline, T.FlightNo, T.DepartLoc, T.ArriveLoc, T.TravelDate FROM persondata.PERSONDATA P, flightdata.FLIGHTDATA T WHERE P.SSN = T.SSN;
